attributes.action: Re introduce capital punishment for child murderers
attributes.additional_details: I want them to review the justice system and sentencing for these horrific crimes, and re introduce  capital punishment
attributes.background: Obtain justice for victims and families who's lives have been destroyed by perpetrators who have not one shred of compassion for any body's right to live, even children

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710
